common.name: Name

settings.free_plan_tip: Free plan available only for 200 MB Storage.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.info: Messages from contacts in the whitelist always go to Inbox folder. Marking a message as not spam adds the address to the Whitelist

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.info: Messages from contacts in the blacklist always go to Spam folder. Marking a message as spam adds the address to the Blacklist.

keys.name: Keys
keys.info: Download your PGP Keys for use with other PGP compatible services. Only incoming messages in inline OpenPGP format are currently supported.

donate.name: Donate
donate.info: Your donation helps us support more users and continue to develop CTemplar as free and open source software.

add_domain_step.name: Domain name
add_domain_step.info: Add a domain that you own to your CTemplar account.

verify_step.name: Verify
verify_step.info:
For security reasons, we need to verify that you are the owner of your domain. Please add the following code into your DNS. Do not remove it even after successful verification. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following TXT record:

mx_step.name: MX
mx_step.info:
Before you can receive emails for your custom domain addresses at CTemplar, you need to add the following MX record to your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following MX record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

spf_step.name: SPF
spf_step.info:
SPF is used to specify who is allowed to send email for the domain so we strongly recommend including CTemplar in your SPF record. Please add the following TXT record into your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

dkim_step.name: DKIM
dkim_step.info:
CTemplar supports DKIM signing for custom domains. To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the follow TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

dmarc_step.name: DMARC
dmarc_step.info:
CTemplar supports DKIM signing for custom domains. To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the follow TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

home_feature.end_to_end_PKI_encryption: We use 4096 bit encryption. This protects users from current cryptography cracking techniques and future hypothetical attacks.
home_feature.track_your_ip: We never track your IP address, keep logs on your usage or record any identifying information at any time. We prove this by making our code readily available
home_feature.iceland_based_server: Iceland has the world’s strongest data privacy laws, so by using our Icelandic servers,your data has the strongest legal protection in the world.Drop your Swiss data plans now
home_feature.exclusive_4_wall: CTemplar’s exclusive 4 Wall Protection guarantees complete wall-to-wall protection of your data.
home_feature.learn_more_about_ctempler: Learn more about the security features of CTemplar

footer.send_unbreakable_emails: Send unbreakable emails & protect your key professional and personal details with next-gen encryption using privacy-centric Icelandic storage..
footer.software_systems: Templar Software Systems Ltd., a Seychelles Limited Liability Company

page_about.as_the_govt_continues: As governments continues to gather data at an increasing pace, greater data privacy and protection is needed. Use of encrypted email is an important step in achieving greater protection. CTemplar is committed to providing the greatest level of data protection.
page_about.idea_to_create_service:
The idea to create this service grew out of a recognition of the threats facing internet privacy and security. Our effort to protect communications through encryption is an entirely new approach, one that will continually strive to employ the most advanced techniques in protecting your data.

CTemplar offers users the world’s most secure encrypted email program. CTemplar’s security does not lie solely in its advanced encryption. CTemplar is structured and domiciled so as to best protect your data from information requests.
page_about.ctempler_is_a_powerful_tool: CTemplar is a powerful tool for users who value privacy.  Our subscribers include a wide variety of users, ranging from corporate, entrusted with a fiduciary duty to protect intellectual property, to individuals, mainly concerned with person privacy.  Regardless of what you are protecting and why, CTemplar provides users with the most advanced safeguards available.
page_about.educators_and_missionaries:
• Educators and missionaries under threat of persecution and death
  • Refugees fleeing from oppressive regimes in their home country
  • Reporters in war-torn and/or dictator-led countries
  • Students looking for communication but finding only oppression
  • Someone working in a business environment where competitor surveillance runs rampant
  • Consumers who want to protect their financial information
  • A relatively safe and comfortable individual who worries about privacy
page_about.regardless_who_you_are: Regardless of who you are and what you seek, this encrypted service is here to help you find your way. If you need assurance that your message , your vision, and your words will be protected from the eyes of those who would hamper them—this service is for you.
page_about.ctempler_legal_team_views:
CTemplar’s legal team views internet privacy as a dynamic issue. It is an evolving landscape. Accordingly, static solutions will not afford your data the level of protection demanded by those who value security.

We have researched all aspects of internet privacy in various jurisdictions in order to assure that our servers are domiciled in the most secure location. Our servers are located in Iceland, recognized as the premier location for internet privacy. The Icelandic government has demonstrated itself to be at the forefront of internet privacy and vigorously enforces the right to be free of government intrusion.

Our legal department continues to research internet security and privacy laws throughout the world so that we may constantly provide users with the maximum level of internet privacy. If there is a proposed change in policy, we will be first to know and have a migration plan in place that ensures complete ongoing security.

page_security.end_to_end_encryption: End-to-End Encryption using Open Source Cryptography
page_security.whether_you_are_sending: Whether you are sending sensitive information to your accountant, business partners, clients, news networks, or simply your friends, your emails are automatically encrypted using strong public key cryptography on our Icelandic servers, so even we cannot read them. Only you and your recipient can decode your emails.
page_security.benefit_from_world: Benefit from the World’s Strictest Data Protection Laws
page_security.most_encrypted_email: Most encrypted email service providers boast about their Swiss data centers. What they fail to tell you is that the Swiss government has an information sharing agreement with other countries, meaning your data could be shared with others without your consent. Iceland has zero sharing agreements and maintains the strictest data privacy laws in the world, so your data stays encrypted on our servers and nowhere else.
page_security.guaranted_anonymity: Guaranteed Anonymity and Zero Access to Your Data
page_security.we_dont_require_any: We do not require any personal information to create your encrypted email account. Simply chose a username and password to access your email interface. Our industry leading “Hash & Salt” technique guarantee even we do not know your login information. For additional security, we do not store your IP logs, which can be traced to your anonymous email account. Your privacy is guaranteed with CTemplar.
page_security.simple_to_use: Simple-to-use Interface Just Like a Regular Email Account
page_security.unlike_the_old_days: Unlike the old days where encrypted emailing meant complex manual encryption CTemplar does it all for you. Simply send and receive your emails, just like a regular email account, and rest assured knowing your privacy is 100% secure.
page_security.encrypted_email_to_non: Encrypted email to non-CTemaplar acounts, self-destructing messages & much more….
page_security.your_contacts_dont_require: Your contacts don’t require a CTemplar account in order to send and receive encrypted emails, they just need access to your Public Key in order to decrypt and open your messages. However, we do recommend everyone use CTemplar email accounts for maximum security since even your stored emails and subject lines will be protected, unlike regular accounts.

page_pricing.do_not_show_ads: This site is not supported by ad revenue or the sharing of subscriber data. Instead, CTemplar relies upon subscription revenue to maintain and improve the quality of our service. Revenue from paid accounts is used to further develop CTemplar, as well as support free users. *Ctemplar cannot be used for spam or for sending bulk emails

Best in class encrypted email
Account creation in only minutes
create_account.new_email_address: This will be your new Ctemplar email address.
create_account.checking_box: By checking this box you understand that If you lose your password and do not set a recovery email your account will not be recoverable.
create_account.password_connected: Your password is connected to your encryption key, if you change your password then you will be issued a new encryption key and ALL contents of your account will be lost except for your email address.

create_account.check_box: Please check this box if you agree to abide by our

create_account.display_name_req: Enter a valid display name with maximum 32 characters.
create_account.can_change_settings: You can change this in the settings page later.
